author: Reid Wilson
title: Health experts call for Roosevelt-style programs to kill virus, revive economy
description: A first-of-its-kind program that will deploy almost a thousand people across Massachusetts may be a small-scale test of what public health experts hope could eventually stamp out the coronavirus even before a vaccine becomes widely available.
content:
